meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tenacious.
meanings.sent1: Her tenaciousness in completing her homework impressed her teacher.
meanings.sent2: His tenaciousness in pursuing his dreams led to his success.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's tenaciousness in chasing its tail was both amusing and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The tenaciousness of the vines clinging to the old brick wall was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber's tenaciousness in reaching the summit inspired others.

meanings.definition: The act of holding fast or sticking together.
meanings.sent1: The tenaciousness of the glue kept the pieces of the broken vase together.
meanings.sent2: The tenaciousness of the spider's web caught many unsuspecting insects.
meanings.sent3: The tenaciousness of the siblings holding hands in the park was quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: The tenaciousness of the magnet pulling the metal objects towards it was fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The tenaciousness of the tape sticking to the paper made it difficult to remove.
